slides.title: New Beginnings
slides.text: Every dog or cat deserves a second chance. By adopting, you turn a broken past into a future full of love and loyalty. Open your heart and your home will be their safe haven.
slides.altButtonText: Get more information about our services and how you can help

slides.title: Who we are
slides.text: We run adoption campaigns and raise awareness about animal abandonment. We protect and care for every dog and cat arriving at our shelter, giving them hope and love.
slides.altButtonText: Learn more about our mission and values

slides.title: Be part of change
slides.text: Your support can take many forms: time to help, a donation to feed, or simply sharing to raise awareness. Every small gesture helps a better tomorrow for them.
slides.altButtonText: Discover how you can volunteer and make a difference

home.title: Home | Shelter JausPet
home.description: Discover how you can help change lives by adopting, donating, or volunteering. At JausPet, every action counts to bring love and a dignified home to dogs and cats waiting for a family.

card_1.alt: Explore our adoption options for dogs and cats, and give them the chance to live in a safe, loving, forever home.

card_2.title: Adoption
card_2.content: Learn how you can transform the life of a loyal companion by opening your heart and welcoming them into your family home.

card_3.alt: Support the shelter with your generous donations, helping us provide food, medical care, safety, and love for every rescued animal here.

card_4.title: Donations
card_4.content: Discover how your contribution, whether small or large, can truly change animals‚Äô lives and support our mission in a lasting way.

campaignSection.title: Don't abandon them, help them find a home
campaignSection.text: Every animal deserves love and care. Before deciding to abandon, consider alternatives like adoption or temporary shelter. Your action can save their life and give them a happy future.
campaignSection.imageAlt: Puppy being left alone on the street

footer.viewExactLocation: View exact location on Google Maps

servicesSection.title: Our Services | JausPet
servicesSection.description: At JausPet we offer a variety of services to ensure the well-being of our pets and to support the community. From responsible adoptions to sterilization campaigns and animal care assistance.

volunteerSection.title: Volunteering | JausPet
volunteerSection.description: Join as a volunteer and help improve the lives of many animals looking for a home.
volunteerSection.introPhrase: Our time, our hands, and our hearts can change lives.
volunteerSection.button: Learn more about how to become a volunteer
captions: Teach and learn about animal care
Your donation fills bellies and hearts

form.title: Sign up here!
form.description: Signing up is easy: fill out the form and we‚Äôll get in touch. Helping doesn‚Äôt always mean adopting; you can also give time and affection.
form.name: Your name

title: Transform lives
Give love
Building communities
description: Spending a few hours can make a difference. Every walk, touch, or gesture of love restores hope to those who need it most. Your time has the power to change destinies.
Animals feel, wait, and trust. A little care and affection can heal invisible wounds and fill their world with joy. To love is also a way to save.
Being a volunteer not only helps animals, it also connects people. Together we build a space of empathy, respect, and hope, where every action drives real change.

donationSection.title: Donations | JausPet
donationSection.description: Support JausPet to help more pets find a loving home. Your contribution makes a difference.
donationSection.inspirationalDescription: Your support helps save animals in situations of abandonment and abuse. Together we can give them a safe home, feed the hungry, and heal their wounds. Thank you for your love.
donationSection.donationIntro: Your support helps save animals in situations of abandonment and abuse. Together we can give them a safe home, feed the hungry, and heal their wounds. Thank you for your love.
donationSection.button: Join now and make a difference
donationSection.whyDonateDescription: Donations are what make our mission possible. Every contribution allows us to cover medical treatments, food, and a safe shelter for the animals we rescue. Together, we can change their story.

donationCards.title: Ways to Donate
cardDescription: Donate directly through our bank account. Safe and quick.
Support us from your nearest OXXO store using our reference.
You can also donate from abroad using our SWIFT code.
Send food, medicine, or toys directly from our wishlist.
donationCards.message: üöß We're working on this section. If you'd like to help, send us an email and we'll tell you how.

aboutUs.title: About Us | JausPet
aboutUs.description: Learn about JausPet, our mission, and how we help pets find loving homes.

title: Animal Welfare
Respect
Love for Helping
Passion
description: We always place the health and happiness of every animal at the heart of our work. Every rescue, vaccination, and care is guided by the commitment to give them a safe and dignified life.
We believe in respect for all living beings. We honor their lives, needs, and nature, promoting a culture of harmonious coexistence between humans and animals.
Our actions are driven by a passion for helping. From rescuing street animals to educating about responsible adoption, everything we do comes from the desire to do good and improve lives.

Passion fuels our shelter. We dedicate ourselves with enthusiasm and commitment to every project, every rescued animal, and every family finding a new companion, because we believe every saved life deserves all our heart.

contact.title: Contact Us | JausPet
contact.description: Get to know JausPet and get in touch with us for any questions or adoption inquiries.
contact.formDescription: We would love to hear from you! If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, please use our contact form.
contact.button: Learn more about animals for adoption

adoptions.description: Discover dogs and cats to adopt and find your perfect companion at JausPet.
